R

READY - Static variable in class jpo.ScalablePicture
status code used to signal that the image is available.
READY - Static variable in class jpo.SourcePicture
status code used to signal that the rotated image is available.
ROTATING - Static variable in class jpo.SourcePicture
status code used to signal that the thread is rotating the image
ROTATION - Static variable in class jpo.Settings
constant to indicate the Rotation to some routines
RecentDropNodeListener - interface jpo.RecentDropNodeListener.
This interface allows the Settings object to notify any interested object that the array Settings.recentDropNodes has changed.
RecentOpenFileListener - interface jpo.RecentOpenFileListener.
This interface allows the Settings to inform an object that the recently opened files array has changed.
ReconcileJFrame - class jpo.ReconcileJFrame.
This class creates a JFrame where the user can specify a directory against which he wants to reconcile the current collection.
ReconcileJFrame(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.ReconcileJFrame
Creates a JFrame with the GUI elements and buttons that can start and stop the reconciliation.
randomAdvance - Variable in class jpo.PictureViewer
variable that controls whether the automatic advance selects the next picture at random or whether it follows the collection.
readAborted(ImageReader) - Method in class jpo.SourcePicture.ImageProgressListener
 
reader - Variable in class jpo.SourcePicture
the reader object that will read the image
readyToAdvance() - Method in interface jpo.AdvanceTimerInterface
The implementing class must support this function which indicates whether it is ready for a picture advance.
readyToAdvance() - Method in class jpo.PictureViewer
method that tells the AdvanceTimer whether it is ok to advance the picture or not This important to avoice the submission of new picture requests before the old ones have been met.
reallocateIndexes() - Method in class jpo.TableSorter

recentDropNodes - Variable in class jpo.GroupPopupMenu
menu items for the recently dropped group nodes
recentDropNodes - Variable in class jpo.PicturePopupMenu
This array of JMenuItems memorises the most recent drop locations and allows The user to quickly select a recently used drop location for the next drop.
recentDropNodes - Static variable in class jpo.Settings
Array of recently used Drop Nodes

requestFileSave() - Method in class jpo.Jpo
Calls the SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode.fileSave() method that saves the current collection under it's present name and if it was never saved before brings up a popup window.
